release.action: Fixed issue 63: Configuration beans replace Apache commons XML hierarchies.
Removed a set of deprecated classes. This was necessary to remove all dependencies on Apache commons configuration.
Fixed issue 27: Adapters always send the largest payload for variable size input structures.
Added methods to handle byte arrays as alternative to streams.

Added a corruption check on receiving data from the mainframe plus a test case. This is because there is now possibility that the mainframe be sending raw data rather than architected legStar messages.
Changed from wait/notify synchronization to Java 1.5 CountDownLatch.
Documentation update to cross reference the new distribution-zos project.
Main classes were renamed from MessageXxx to LegStarMessageXxx. This was necessary because several third party products were using similar class names causing conflicts.
Some classes were moved into a new messaging-impl project so that messaging could stay agnostic from implementation details.
First version of the Messaging protocol.
